QuestData.Title: Standing Accused
QuestData.Description:
So you wish to speak with the accused? I see no reason why not.
Be quick about it, though. I will not have our trial delayed. This woman will answer for the fate of our village!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lucy Waycrest in Hangman's Point.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is your business here, mainlander?
QuestData.RewardText:
So Lady Waycrest has asked that you convince me to let her stand trial?
I think she underestimates the danger of this situation...
